page.title: 04MAINS OF BOQUHAN FARM
page.content: {Mains of Boquhan}is owned and farmed by{Wm. More}and his sister{Miss M. {More}who have lived and worked there all their lives.It lies near{Kippen, 15 kilometers west of{Stirling}in the flat carse-land beside the{River {Forth.}The{soil}is of a clay-type and {crops}grown incude :-oats,barley,hay and grass{.Livestock}include cattle and sheep bought in the autumn and sold in the spring after fattening. {Machinery:-}Mr, More shares a combine harvester,a mechanical digger and a baler with his brother at{Shirgarton. The farm still has an out building called a{millring.}This was where one of the farm's horses walked round and round attached to a horizontal pole which moved cogs generating power for the farm.
